mapper.insert: insert into t_collections(collection_id, collection_name, description, create_time, date_time, city_id) values (#{collectionId}, #{collectionName}, #{description}, #{createTime}, now(), #{cityId})
mapper.select: SELECT collection_id, collection_name, description, create_time, date_time, is_del, city_id FROM t_collections WHERE collection_id != 0 AND is_del = 1
SELECT collection_id, collection_name, description, create_time, date_time, is_del, city_id FROM t_collections WHERE collection_id = #{collectionId} AND is_del = 1
